description: This file defines API routes for managing categories in a backend system using FastAPI. It includes endpoints for listing, creating, retrieving by ID or slug, updating, and deleting categories. The file also contains a utility function for generating URL-friendly slugs from category names.

methods.name: str _slugify(value: str)
methods.description: Converts a string into a URL-friendly slug by lowercasing, replacing non-alphanumeric characters with hyphens, collapsing multiple hyphens, and trimming hyphens.

methods.name: Paginated[CategoryRead] list_categories( q: Optional[str] = Query(default=None, description="Search query (matches name or slug)"), page: int = Query(default=1, ge=1, description="Page number (1-based)"), page_size: int = Query(default=20, ge=1, le=100, description="Items per page"), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list categories with optional search and pagination.

methods.name: CategoryRead create_category(payload: CategoryCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new category, generating a slug if not provided.

methods.name: CategoryRead get_category(category_id: str, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Retrieves a category by its ID.

methods.name: CategoryRead get_category_by_slug(slug: str, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Retrieves a category by its slug.

methods.name: CategoryRead update_category(category_id: str, payload: CategoryUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Updates fields of an existing category, including slug regeneration if name is changed.

methods.name: Response delete_category(category_id: str, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Deletes a category by its ID.
